CURRENCY EXCHANGE RATE: 1USD=6.5RMB
NIGHT SHIFT-7PM-7AM WILL BE CHARGED AT 1.5 TIMES UNIT RATE
SATURDAYS WILL BE CHARGED AT 1.25 TIMES UNIT RATE
SUNDAYS & PUBLIC HOLIDAYS WILL BE CHARGED AT 1.5 TIMES UNIT RATE
UNIT RATE APPLIES TO ALL INSPECTION. TRAVEL AND REPORTING TIME
UNIT RATE IS NET OF APPLICABLE LOCAL AND FEDERAL TAXES OF COUNTRY OF EXECUTION (E. G. VAT. ETC)
MINIMUM CHARGE OF 5 HOURS APPLIES TO EACH EVENT (PER DATE AND SITE)
